articles.description:

  3. NASA astronaut is setting new single-flight dura…
articles.content:
NASA
 astronaut Mark Vande Hei
 has broken the record for longest US human spaceflight
, a title former astronaut Scott Kelly has held since 2016.

articles.title: Peyush Bansal and Girish Mathrubootham-backed inFeedo raises $12 million from Tiger Global, others - Business Insider India
articles.description: Employee experience platform inFeedo — which is used by companies like Samsung, TATA, Paytm and OYO — has raised $12 million in a round led by Jungle Ventures, with participation from Tiger Global and existing investors including Bling Capital.
